00017 int strncasecmp(const char *s1, const char *s2, size_t n)
00018 {
00019   if (n == 0)
00020     return 0;
00021 
00022   while((n-- != 0)
00023     && (tolower(*(unsigned char *) s1) ==
00024         tolower(*(unsigned char *) s2))) {
00025     if (n == 0 || *s1 == '\0' || *s2 == '\0')
00026       return 0;
00027     s1++;
00028     s2++;
00029   }
00030 
00031   return tolower(*(unsigned char *) s1) - tolower(*(unsigned char *) s2);
00032 }
